message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $10,000 for it. It's a fair price considering its worth to you. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but I believe I can't justify spending $10,000 on it at this time. I am willing to pay up to $8,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 isn't quite enough for me at this time. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?  This would still be a great deal for you considering the value you place on the product. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not able to justify spending $9,000 on the product. I am willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
